attributes.action: Abolish the use of the word UNLIMITED in connection with broadband services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most, if not all telephone / ISP companies offer "Unlimited" broadband and then go on, in the small print to say that the service is subject to fair usage and other restrictions. This applies to speed limiting or indeed limiting the type of information you can download from various sites. The companies that offer "Unlimited" services should only be able to do so as long as there is no limit at all to the data rate, type of data or any other fair use policy.
